item.title: Project Insanity : adding objects to a list with a timer ... just read this xD
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]there’s two classes for the object entity already (Object // Objects (i believe they are in the world package))

they have methods for ‘tick’ and ‘objectTicks’

now look in the ObjectManager // ObjectHandler to see how they are used.[/quote]

Thanks , i’ll look into it

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity : adding objects to a list with a timer ... just read this xD
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]you’re appending the timer to the player object.

append it to the tree object as an entity[/quote]

I’ve never worked with entities , tell me where to use it or how to call it and i’ll figure the rest out myself

Read full topic
